notes.workspace_name_optional: Workspace name is not required by the Notion API
notes.property_mapping_info: Maps Gemini response fields to Notion database properties. Can be a string or array of strings to map one field to multiple properties (e.g., title to both 'Episode' and 'Source')
notes.static_properties_info: Properties with fixed values that are always set (e.g., content_type='Video'). Uses select type by default.
notes.content_sections_info: Maps Gemini response fields to Notion page body content with custom headings
